mapper.sql: id, openid, nick_name, wx_img, phone, comments, realy_name, address, enabled
mapper.insert:

id,
openid,
nick_name,
wx_img,
phone,
comments,
realy_name,
address,
enabled,

mapper.update:
update client
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wx_img = #{wxImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
realy_name = #{realyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update client set openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wx_img = #{wxImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realy_name = #{realyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM client WHERE openid = #{openid} and enabled = 1
